title: S. Gilbert Blount Endowed Chair in Cardiovascular Research
description: To augment the salary and provide program funds for an endowed Chair in the School of Medicine, Department of  Cardiology, at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To augment the salary and provide program funds for an endowed Chair in the School of Medicine, Department of  Cardiology, at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
